Html: I cant figure out how create hyperlink which leads into other sheet in the same document. Dunno if it could be somehow passed as hyperlink URL. Or even better there should be a method which could create link into other sheet depending on sheet index. Like $sheet->getCell('A1')->getHyperlink()->setSheet($sheet_index)
